scripts.create-dump: echo "pg_dump -U postgres personal_app_db > /var/app/database/dump.sql" | docker exec -i personal-app-database bash;
scripts.dev:db-and-api: rm -rf ./dist && npm run build && docker-compose -f ./compose.dev.yml up
scripts.init-db: npm run build && (echo "bash /var/app/database/scripts/init-db-1.sh" | docker exec -i personal-app-database bash;) && (echo npm --prefix /var/app run migration:up | docker exec -i personal-app-database bash;) && (echo "bash /var/app/database/scripts/init-db-2.sh" | docker exec -i personal-app-database bash;)
scripts.migration:generate: npm run build && node --loader ts-node/esm ./node_modules/.bin/typeorm migration:generate -d ./src/config/ormConfig.ts
scripts.remove-containers: docker stop personal-app-api && docker rm personal-app-api && docker stop personal-app-database && docker rm personal-app-database
scripts.remove-images: docker stop personal-app-api && docker rm personal-app-api && docker rmi personal-app-server_api && docker stop personal-app-database && docker rm personal-app-database && docker rmi personal-app-server_database
